Sinceramente el juego me parece bueno, gracias a que se puede equipar a las 9 clases con Armas desbloqueables, skins de armas, hats y más. Incluye a los Tours de MVM (Hombre VS Maquina), Sumamente entretenidos y es más allí hay que trabajar en equipo, muy entretenido. Además de muchas mecanicas que tiene, especialmente por el motor gráfico de Hl2. Bueno para jugar con amigos, un vicio.
мне всё нравится даже не капильки мне сдесь не нравится

This is a well made, stylized, team based first person shooter. Teamwork is needed to win at higher levels of play. Lone wolfing is fine on lower skill levels such as on most public servers. There are 9 classes (each with his own distinct personality) to choose from. The banter between the different classes is entertaining to listen to. Each class has unique weapons and abilities that allow him to fulfill a unique roll as part of a larger team. This provides for a challenging and rewarding experience when faced against opponents of similar or higher skill levels. The game has an active dev team that continues to release updates to the game that add new content such as weapons or game modes.

At the time of this review, there are two official modes of play: player versus player and 'Mann Versus Machine'.

Player versus player is a mode where one team of players battles against another team of players. Within this mode, there are different types of maps. Each type of map has it's own objective or objectives for each team to achieve.

'Mann Versus Machine' is a mode where a team of up to 6 players battles against waves of bots. Players collect money from destroyed bots. The money is divided equally among players in the team and can be used to purchase upgrades and abilities for the next wave of bots. The pay to play sub-mode, "Mann Up", gives rewards upon completing a "tour".

In addition to the official modes of play, there are several player made mods that introduce other modes of play such as 'Versus Saxton Hale', where a team of players battles against a player playing as a character named Saxton Hale; 'Dodge Ball', where two teams of players playing as Pyros must airblast rockets and other projectiles back and forth in order to stay alive; 'Zombie Mod', where a team of players must make it to the end of the map without dying to zombies that are played by other players; to name just a few of the many player made mods available.

In addition to game play, players will randomly receive free items from the game. Some of the free items given out are weapons, hats and crates. Hats can be worn by a class to change the appearance of that class. Crates can be opened with a key. Keys can be purchased from the Mann Co Store or from the Steam Community Market or traded for from another player. Most crates will list which items can be found within them.

The game has several communities for a player to choose from if a community is what you are looking for. The game is easy to pick up and play, either alone or with friends, yet has a depth of play that will keep you from becoming bored too quickly. The dynamics between the different classes, weapons, play styles, skill levels, modes and maps provides content for many hours of play. I have been playing since November 2016 and I still return to the game on a regular basis.

Es un gran FPS del que la verdad nunca me canso de jugar. El armamento es amplio para cada personaje y más aun las combinaciones que puedes hacer con ellos y su estilo cartoon combinado con la sangre y explosiones de los personajes es de lo mejor.

The best FPS of the past decade with a balance between funny taunts and deerpy gore. For example a head shot decapitates someone how? I but its a video game so it doesn't have to make sense. The hundreds of community made maps guns cosmetics every thing. It's like overwatch but set in a more modern time and for free. Overall I'd give this a ten outta ten for every thing.

Depois de muito tempo, vim e reformulei o que tinha escrito, pois na época eu gostava muito dele.
Hoje, raramente ele recebe uma atualização, pois ele já é um clássico da Steam e já até se tornou grátis. Gráficos bonitos, jogabilidade boa e ideia legal por ser pioneiro nesse tipo de ramo de algo mais cartonizado. Se recomendo? Sim, mas não direi que você ficará vidrado, pois a palavra que o define hoje é clássico.
Nota: 9/10

Team Fortess 2, neben TFC ein absoluter klassiker der Computerspiel geschichte.
Seit 2011 ist das Spiel Free2Play und finanziert sich mit den Verkauf von Items und das wohl sehr erfolgreich.
Ich habe das Spiel damals erhalten als ich Half-Life 2 gekauft habe, sowie TFC bei Half-Life 1 dabei war. (Wenn ich mich recht erinnere...wir werden alt :O )
Die umstellung zum F2P Modell hat das Spiel keineswegs zerstört. Es ist und bleibt mein Lieblings "fun teambased first person shooter".
Das Spiel ist ein wahnsinn und Overwatch kann einpacken...
Meine Spielstunden auf diesem Account sind jetzt nicht gerade viel, doch das ist mein Zweitaccount :)
Zusammen komme ich auf ca 1000 Stunden in den letzten ~9 Jahren

这是一个名为TFGO的循环游戏：掉箱子，买钥匙，开箱子，血亏一波；掉箱子，买钥匙，开箱子，血亏一波....循环往复，令全世界多少大好青年深陷其中，无法自拔。
当我每次开完箱子之后，我面色凝重，深深低下了头默默关上了电脑，起身打开冰箱，随手拿上一罐瑞奥鸡尾酒，紧紧握在手里走到阳台前。外面景色有些黯淡，如同我的心情一样沉重，渐渐地，下起了小雨。为什么会这样，视线模糊了，不知道是雨还是泪....可能，都有吧。我的心情更加忧郁，再也无法压抑内心的情感，大喊了一声：“这尼玛开的都是啥玩意啊！”

An FPS-turned-meme material, Team Fortress 2 is one unique FPS, where the classes have very different personalities, looks, and voices. TF2 made each classes seem like characters, rather than typical FPS classes who only have different roles and weapons.
